item.title: Android Market Best of Apps you must have
item.description: 29 Sep 09:¬†This is the better post to read: http://damien.co/2009/08/11/10-best-android-apps-for-your-phone/ Ok I’ve been using an HTC Magic for a few days now and I’m loving it ‚Ä¶ I’m so hooked I could almost get myself kicked out of the house, or have my ‘beautiful & precious’ phone smashed üôÅHere’s what you too should try there are so many free Apps in the Android Market that you can’t get bored. Given how much I use a phone and my focus on the mobiles and music, heres a choice selection
